Squamish.title: Squamish
Squamish.byline: Squamish is a town of about 20,000 people (2016) in the Sea to Sky region of British Columbia half-way between Vancouver and Whistler.

Squaw Valley.title: Squaw Valley
Squaw Valley.byline: Squaw Valley is a ski resort town on the border between California and Nevada area centered around Lake Tahoe.
